title: Big Ass Fans Haiku Generation 4: IoT's a Breeze
description: Starting at $1600, are these smart ceiling fans worth the money?

title: Google's leaked product roadmap looks strikingly familiar
description: A (no longer) secret product roadmap suggests that a biennial $449 mid-ranger and two 'Pro' models are on the docket, and I'm not talking about Apple.

title: This supermarket doesn't trust self-checkout shoppers, so it installed -- oh, this
description: How far will the self-checkout nonsense go? Very far indeed.

title: Dear Samsung, here's a heartfelt New Year's resolution for you
description: Samsung is trying to do what it did before, but in a vastly different world. Maybe it's time for a rethink?

title: MyRepublic exits Australia broadband market to refocus on 'profitability'
description: Internet service provider will transfer its broadband subscriber base to Superloop, as it exits the Australian market in a bid to "refocus towards profitability" and its domestic Singapore market.
